actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to acquire certain property in the District of Columbia for use for Federal purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of General Services to acquire specified property in the District of Columbia known as the Scott-Grant house on R Street for use for Federal purposes. Authorizes the reconstruction, refurbishing, and repairing of such property.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to acquire certain property in the District of Columbia for use for Federal purposes.
